name: omniclaude-agents
description: 53 polymorphic YAML agents for OmniClaude with programmatic routing support. Includes PR review, debugging, testing, security auditing, API architecture, performance analysis, and intelligent workflow orchestration.

quality.description: Code quality, testing, type validation, and PR review

architecture.description: API design, documentation architecture, and AST generation

development.description: Debugging, performance analysis, and development support

research.description: Repository analysis, research, RAG operations, and documentation indexing

devops.description: Infrastructure management, production monitoring, and automation

workflow.description: PR workflows, commits, and ticket management

intelligence.description: Intelligence initialization, context gathering, and content summarization

observability.description: Agent observability, velocity tracking, and metrics logging

generation.description: Contract-driven code generation and multi-step frameworks

specialized.description: Domain-specific agents for tickets, batch processing, and smart responses

routing.note: All agents are in YAML format for programmatic routing via the polymorphic agent framework
